trait.label: Mongol
trait.note: C. Atwood note:Seems to be Noya'ud. This is not attested but should be a plural -ud of a root Noyaq. This root Noyaq in turn may be the origin of the attested Mongol family name Noyagin (-gin is a gentilic suffix). So I guess that Noya'd is most likely an alternative form of the surname Noyagin. If so ethno-legal category is Mongol
